trigger.name: General - Clock differs more than {$TRG_TME_THS_HGH} secs

dependency.name: Memory - Free memory is less than {$TRG_MEM_THS_DST_IN}%

trigger.name: Memory - Free memory is less than {$TRG_MEM_THS_WRN_IN}%

dependency.name: Memory - Free memory is less than {$TRG_MEM_THS_HGH_IN}%

trigger.name: Network - Service ssh is not accepting connection
Process - Number of "{$ITM_DHC_PRC_NAM}" processes is not {$TRG_DHC_OPT_NUM}
Process - Number of "{$ITM_NSL_PRC_NAM}" processes is not {$TRG_NSL_OPT_NUM}
Process - Number of "{$ITM_NTP_PRC_NAM}" processes is not {$TRG_NTP_OPT_NUM}
Process - Number of "{$ITM_SLG_PRC_NAM}" processes is not {$TRG_SLG_OPT_NUM}
Process - Number of "{$ITM_SSH_PRC_NAM}" processes is less than {$TRG_SSH_OPT_NUM}
Process - Number of processes in "run" state is more than {$TRG_PRC_RUN_THS_HGH}
Process - Number of processes in "run" state is more than {$TRG_PRC_RUN_THS_WRN}

dependency.name: Process - Number of processes in "run" state is more than {$TRG_PRC_RUN_THS_HGH}

trigger.name: Process - Number of processes in "zomb" state is more than {$TRG_PRC_ZMB_THS_HGH}
Process - Number of processes in "zomb" state is more than {$TRG_PRC_ZMB_THS_WRN}

dependency.name: Process - Number of processes in "zomb" state is more than {$TRG_PRC_ZMB_THS_HGH}

trigger.name: Process - Number of processes is more than {$TRG_PRC_THS_WRN}
Swap - Free swap space is less than {$TRG_SWP_THS_DST_IN}%
Swap - Free swap space is less than {$TRG_SWP_THS_HGH_IN}%

dependency.name: Swap - Free swap space is less than {$TRG_SWP_THS_DST_IN}%

trigger.name: Swap - Free swap space is less than {$TRG_SWP_THS_WRN_IN}%

dependency.name: Swap - Free swap space is less than {$TRG_SWP_THS_HGH_IN}%
